attributes.action: Get Orange/EE to sort out their signal.
attributes.additional_details: People are paying a lot of money to Orange/EE and receiving absolutely no signal, it disappears for hours on end leaving only the 'SOS' sign when signal is present it is very intermittent! The adverts suggest 'Everything Everywhere' - lies. Too much money being ploughed into the adverts and not enough into decent cables and signal. Ever since EE took over its been rubbish! Sort it out!
